A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've finally seen it and oh boy is it a mess. Simply put\, The Last Jedi takes everything that was bad about The Force Awakens and amplifies it while ignoring the few actually interesting story elements that the previous movie had established. \n\nWhile one should not attribute to malice what can be explained by mere incompetence\, it's hard to shake the feeling that The Last Jedi was indeed meant as a giant middle finger to fans of the franchise.
